displaymath.Errors:
&\Delta X = val\%{\m{rdg}} + val{\m{dgt}} = val\cdot val{\m{ unit}} + 0,0003{\m{ unit}} = val{\m{ unit}},\\ 
 &\delta X = \frac{\Delta X}{X}\cdot 100\% = \frac{val}{val}\cdot 100\% = val\%.
displaymath.Indirect error: &Z = f(X, Y),\\&\delta Z = \left|\frac{\partial Z}{\partial Y}\cdot \Delta Y\right| + \left|\frac{\partial Z}{\partial X}\cdot \Delta X\right|
